item.title: Man in the Making
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
Shawty, it’s about a man in the making And a life that’s out there for his taking Chasing a story with gold and glory Holes and holy well to be less lonely Hoary, for he felt sorry for being whorey Fine me if you find these lines phony Honey, if you relate, great it’ll be …

Man in the Making Read More »

The post Man in the Making appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
Shawty, it’s about a man in the making
And a life that’s out there for his taking
Chasing a story with gold and glory
Holes and holy well to be less lonely
Hoary, for he felt sorry for being whorey
Fine me if you find these lines phony
Honey, if you relate, great it’ll be thorny
Or else spineless whine of a cornless corny

Wrote what I caught as my thoughts fought
Wrought a lot, still, dot dot… dotless drought
Naught nada nothing to note, nothing to gloat
Gotta plot a lot to find just one spot for this GOAT
Hot red-hot ramen in my head, stop I’m fuckin’ fed
Up with meeting my ends which ends up dead
Heads up I’d rather be dead now than be another
Subpar greyhead in deathbed weeping for the reaper

I admit I was in a vacuum within my darkroom
Trying to seat my feet in others’ shoes’ no excuse
And as I chose to cage my insecurities in a closet
I was lost, locked in n’ left with a loose neck noose
But rose-tinted memories were all a lost cause needs
At times when grasping at straws and flimsy reeds
Held me together under the rain n’ thunder’s reign
Trusting the seeds I’d sown both in words n’ deeds

Hey mister the world’s bloody sinister n’ Imma sinner
Err is to be me human who killed his way to the heaven
I’m no angel nor lucifer crucified for the deadly seven
But off the seven point seven billion, am I even a good one?
Hmm hum this might sound like umm rant dumb
Ho hum voice of people in drains, dregs n’ dump
Numb as they come from beyond the flattering filters
Glitter n’ glam, where hustle’s real, fun n’ joy the fillers

So pull back n’ peek a panic attack of a big blown crack
Quack croak cry of a hunchback, out of his whack
With a throat lump bigger than a boulder on his back
Weighing on a heart that’s chronically homesick
Click-clack boom thoughts like 9mm headshots fired
And tired connecting dots shattered yet silly inspired
By a few indistinct and distant dreams and desires
Reaching ’em is my sole resolve until this Life retires

Now I’m waving goodbye to a past that passed by
And the feet drift to a road less traveled by
Although the eyes find them seemingly strayed
But my heart says, “Leave it, let the way decide”
So, this is a story of a man’s legacy in the making
And about a life that’s out there for his taking
See if you relate, great it’ll be a complex melody
Else willy-nilly, it’ll come out as a confused medley

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post Man in the Making appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: One Shot One Moment
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
I write, I erase, I write and I rephrase Day in and day out, I’m on a ceaseless chase Each day I wake up buried and broken Breathing for my one shot, one moment In the cusp of darkness, as a new dawn stares With a greed for life, my fuckin’ mind flares I hear …

One Shot One Moment Read More »

The post One Shot One Moment appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
I write, I erase, I write and I rephrase
Day in and day out, I’m on a ceaseless chase

Each day I wake up buried and broken
Breathing for my one shot, one moment

In the cusp of darkness, as a new dawn stares
With a greed for life, my fuckin’ mind flares

I hear the wind rustle, rousing me to wrestle
Hustle and bustle my way thru mindless muscles

I get off the bed half dead mind spread
Still led in search for my everyday bread

Breath stuck like a stone in the throat
Just gasping for my one shot, one moment

Thus I write, I erase, I write and I rephrase
Day in and day out, I’m on a ceaseless chase

A tribute to Eminem

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post One Shot One Moment appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: Us Against The World
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
You’ll feel the words choke up and bleed blue If for a while, you walk a mile in his shoes In a crack amidst a world of little and more Life’s just day chores and nightly heartsore As the lungs gasp till the end of my days His split mind will shatter in varied ways …

Us Against The World Read More »

The post Us Against The World appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
You’ll feel the words choke up and bleed blue
If for a while, you walk a mile in his shoes

In a crack amidst a world of little and more
Life’s just day chores and nightly heartsore

As the lungs gasp till the end of my days
His split mind will shatter in varied ways

My wicked heart will leave and stray
While the dreamy reality resets like always

Yet we will be together when it ends
To put a period to our ways and words

Buried as one in the valley of kings
‘It was all a dream’, our elegy sings

For him, about him, my antonym
I’ll drop the eyes with no more disguise

In your flow, you wouldn’t know
It’d been all for him, about him, my antonym

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post Us Against The World appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: A Boy In The Bubble And His Mystic Squid
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
With no fuzz no trouble Aiming no crown or label Imma boy in the bubble capable Of scripting a fable outta rubble Grooving in the depths of my dreams Where even my silence screams Cold and clinical in my lyrical Against the tide, I surf invincible See my mystic squid on papers Subtly swimming in …

A Boy In The Bubble And His Mystic Squid Read More »

The post A Boy In The Bubble And His Mystic Squid appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
With no fuzz no trouble
Aiming no crown or label
Imma boy in the bubble capable
Of scripting a fable outta rubble
Grooving in the depths of my dreams
Where even my silence screams
Cold and clinical in my lyrical
Against the tide, I surf invincible
See my mystic squid on papers
Subtly swimming in several layers
Call it squid or this poet’s pen
It lends my mind a voice again
With ink and the appetite to think
I write and paint my logic in link
Wealthy in words verbally rich
With the treasure of words, I stitch
Weaving my story knit by knit
As time leaves my grasp bit by bit
Before I turn into a pit or lit
Gotta make every moment a hit
Though my mind n’ heartstrings are split
Still can’t won’t quit, want the best of it
Till I’m down in the casket, calm as shit
I’ll be my own God in this flight’s cockpit

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post A Boy In The Bubble And His Mystic Squid appeared first on Aberrance.

item.title: Storyteller
item.dc:creator: Vasan
item.description:
While scripting this story, there are times when I’m stuck in the middle of some lines. I’m clueless about what to write next. There have been times when I felt like dropping the pen or putting a full stop to the story. But then I take a break to gain some clarity. And pretty soon, …

Storyteller Read More »

The post Storyteller appeared first on Aberrance.
item.content:encoded:
While scripting this story, there are times when I’m stuck in the middle of some lines. I’m clueless about what to write next. There have been times when I felt like dropping the pen or putting a full stop to the story.

But then I take a break to gain some clarity. And pretty soon, I start with a new paragraph or even a new page. I wish to scribble on this blank canvas to my heart’s content. And as the story progresses, I keep on changing its theme and style.

The characters in this story are very dear to me. After every few arcs, new characters enter and some old ones leave, which is all part and parcel of the story. But all relationships are significant and all characters have their part to play.

So, that’s all for the preface. Let’s read and enjoy the rest of the story together.

Vasan

We all are aberrant from the ways of this world in one way or another | Sub-Editor at Smartprix.com

The post Storyteller appeared first on Aberrance.
